001package io.github.ai4ci.flow;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.lang.Thread.State;
005import java.nio.file.Path;
006
007import org.mariuszgromada.math.mxparser.License;
008import org.slf4j.Logger;
009import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
010
011import io.github.ai4ci.config.ExperimentConfiguration;
012import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.SimulationExporter;
013import oshi.SystemInfo;
014import oshi.hardware.HardwareAbstractionLayer;
015
016/**
017 * There is one monitor thread running during the simulation. It keeps track of
018 * the number of threads in use and available memory. If there is available
019 * memory it will poll for a new simulation to be created by the factory. If
020 * there are queued simulations ready to be run it will spawn a new thread and
021 * execute them (individual simulations will be processed in parallel also).
022 */
023public class SimulationMonitor implements Runnable {
024
025        private static final long WAIT_FOR_MEMORY = 5 * 60 * 1000;
026        // reserve at least 512Mb for system
027        private static final long RESERVE = 512 * 1024 * 1024;
028
029        static SystemInfo si = new SystemInfo();
030        static HardwareAbstractionLayer hal = si.getHardware();
031        static Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SimulationMonitor.class);
032
033        /**
034         * Get a string describing the current free memory in the system and JVM.
035         * This is used for logging and debugging purposes to monitor memory usage
036         * during the simulation.
037         *
038         * @return a formatted string showing free memory in GB, used memory in GB
039         *         and percentage, and available system memory in GB
040         */
041        public static String freeMemG() {
042                var sys = ((float) hal.getMemory().getAvailable())
043                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
044                var freeHeap = ((float) Runtime.getRuntime().freeMemory())
045                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
046                var maxHeap = ((float) Runtime.getRuntime().maxMemory())
047                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
048                var currentHeap = ((float) Runtime.getRuntime().totalMemory())
049                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
050                var allocatable = Math.min(maxHeap - currentHeap, sys);
051                var allocated = currentHeap - freeHeap;
052                return String.format(
053                                "%1.2f Gb remaining; %1.2f Gb used (%1.2f%%) [%1.2f Gb system]",
054                                allocatable + freeHeap, allocated,
055                                allocated / (currentHeap + allocatable) * 100, sys
056                );
057        }
058
059        /**
060         * Calculate the proportion of used memory to available memory, taking into
061         * account both JVM heap and system memory. This is used to determine when to
062         * throttle the simulation factory or execution due to low memory conditions.
063         *
064         * @param sysReserved the amount of system memory (in bytes) to reserve for
065         *                    non-simulation processes
066         * @return the proportion of used memory to available memory, as a value
067         *         between 0 and 1
068         */
069        public static double usedOfAvailable(long sysReserved) {
070
071                var sysAvail = ((float) hal.getMemory().getAvailable() - sysReserved)
072                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
073                var freeHeap = ((float) Runtime.getRuntime().freeMemory())
074                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
075                var maxHeap = ((float) Runtime.getRuntime().maxMemory())
076                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
077                var currentHeap = ((float) Runtime.getRuntime().totalMemory())
078                                / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
079                var allocatable = Math.min(maxHeap - currentHeap, sysAvail);
080                var allocated = currentHeap - freeHeap;
081                return allocated / (currentHeap + allocatable);
082        }
083
084        SimulationFactory factory;
085        SimulationExporter exporter;
086        int duration;
087        Object trigger = new Object();
088        volatile private boolean halt = false;
089
090        /**
091         * Create a new SimulationMonitor with the given configuration and base
092         * directory for output. This will initialise the simulation factory and
093         * exporter based on the provided configuration, and write the input
094         * configuration to the output directory.
095         *
096         * @param config        the experiment configuration containing setup and
097         *                      execution details
098         * @param baseDirectory the base directory for output files generated by the
099         *                      exporter
100         * @throws IOException if there is an error writing the input configuration
101         *                     or initialising the exporter
102         */
103        public SimulationMonitor(ExperimentConfiguration config, Path baseDirectory)
104                        throws IOException {
105
106                License.iConfirmNonCommercialUse("rob.challen@bristol.ac.uk");
107
108                this.exporter = config.exporter(baseDirectory);
109                this.exporter.writeInputConfiguration(config);
110                var setups = config.getBatchSetupList();
111                var executions = config.getExecution();
112                this.factory = SimulationFactory.startFactory(
113                                setups, executions, config.getBatchConfig().getUrnBase(), this
114                );
115                this.duration = config.getBatchConfig().getSimulationDuration();
116        }
117
118        /**
119         * Handle exceptions that occur during the simulation. This will set the halt
120         * flag to true to signal the monitor to stop processing, and print the stack
121         * trace of the exception for debugging purposes.
122         *
123         * @param e the exception that occurred during the simulation
124         */
125        public void handle(Exception e) {
126                this.halt = true;
127                e.printStackTrace();
128        }
129
130        private boolean isRunning(SimulationExecutor ex) {
131                return ex != null && !ex.getState().equals(State.TERMINATED);
132        }
133
134        /**
135         * Notify the monitor that a simulation execution has completed. This will
136         * log the status of the executor and notify any waiting threads that may be
137         * waiting for a simulation to complete or a new simulation to be queued.
138         *
139         * @param executor the SimulationExecutor that has completed execution
140         */
141        protected void notifyExecutionComplete(SimulationExecutor executor) {
142                log.info("Execution complete: " + executor.status());
143                synchronized (this.trigger) {
144                        this.trigger.notifyAll();
145                }
146        }
147
148        /**
149         * Notify the monitor that a new simulation is ready to be executed. This
150         * will log the status of the factory and notify any waiting threads that may
151         * be waiting for a simulation to complete or a new simulation to be queued.
152         *
153         * @param factory the SimulationFactory that has a new simulation ready for
154         *                execution
155         */
156        protected void notifyFactoryReady(SimulationFactory factory) {
157                log.info("Build complete: " + factory.status());
158                synchronized (this.trigger) {
159                        this.trigger.notifyAll();
160                }
161        }
162
163        @Override
164        public void run() {
165                SimulationExecutor executor = null;
166                try {
167
168                        double freeSysGb = hal.getMemory().getAvailable()
169                                        / (1024 * 1024 * 1024);
170
171                        var abortTime = Long.MAX_VALUE;
172
173                        while (!this.factory.finished() || this.isRunning(executor)) {
174
175                                if (this.halt) { break; }
176
177                                var checkAgainInMs = 1000;
178                                // long memLimit = factory.getSimulationSize().orElse(0);
179
180                                if (usedOfAvailable(RESERVE) > 0.80 || freeSysGb < 1) {
181                                        this.factory.pause();
182                                        log.warn(
183                                                        "Low memory. Throttling factory production. Memory: "
184                                                                        + freeMemG()
185                                        );
186                                } else {
187                                        // This will only be successful if the cache is not already full;
188                                        this.factory.unpause();
189                                }
190
191                                if (usedOfAvailable(RESERVE) > 0.90 || freeSysGb < 0.5) {
192                                        System.gc();
193                                        abortTime = Math.min(
194                                                        abortTime, System.currentTimeMillis() + WAIT_FOR_MEMORY
195                                        );
196                                        if (executor != null) {
197                                                executor.pause();
198                                                log.warn(
199                                                                "Very low memory. Throttling simulation execution. Memory: "
200                                                                                + freeMemG()
201                                                );
202                                        } else {
203                                                log.warn(
204                                                                "Very low memory. Delaying simulation execution. Memory: "
205                                                                                + freeMemG()
206                                                );
207                                        }
208                                        log.warn(
209                                                        "Aborting in "
210                                                                        + (abortTime - System.currentTimeMillis()) / 1000
211                                                                        + " secs unless memory improves"
212                                        );
213                                        log.info("Exporters: " + this.exporter.report());
214
215                                        if (this.exporter.allWaiting()) {
216                                                log.warn(
217                                                                "Exporters all empty. Trying to clear simulation despite very low memory."
218                                                );
219                                                if (executor != null) { executor.unpause(); }
220                                        }
221
222                                        checkAgainInMs = 1000;
223
224                                } else {
225                                        abortTime = Long.MAX_VALUE;
226                                        if (this.isRunning(executor)) {
227                                                executor.unpause();
228                                        } else {
229                                                if (executor != null) {
230                                                        // Executor is not running because it is complete
231                                                        // log the final state:
232                                                        log.info(executor.status());
233                                                        executor = null;
234                                                }
235                                                // Start a new simulation
236                                                if (this.factory.ready()) {
237                                                        executor = new SimulationExecutor(
238                                                                        this, this.factory.deliver(), this.exporter,
239                                                                        this.duration
240                                                        );
241                                                        executor.start();
242                                                        log.info("Starting new simulation");
243                                                } else {
244                                                        log.warn("Waiting for simulation to run");
245                                                        this.factory.unpause();
246                                                        checkAgainInMs = 1000;
247                                                }
248                                        }
249                                }
250
251                                if (usedOfAvailable(RESERVE) > 0.95 || freeSysGb < 0.25) {
252
253                                        if (this.exporter.allWaiting()
254                                                        && (executor == null || executor.isWaiting())
255                                                        && this.factory.isWaiting()) {
256                                                log.error(
257                                                                "Critically low memory. All processes blocked. Terminating early: "
258                                                                                + freeMemG()
259                                                );
260                                                throw new InterruptedException("Out of memory");
261                                        }
262                                        log.warn(
263                                                        "Critically low memory. Waiting for exporters to clear backlog.: "
264                                                                        + freeMemG()
265                                        );
266                                        System.gc();
267                                        checkAgainInMs = 1000;
268
269                                }
270
271                                log.info("Factory: " + this.factory.status());
272                                if (this.isRunning(executor)) {
273                                        log.info("Executor: " + executor.status() + " - " + freeMemG());
274                                }
275
276                                // Sleep the monitor thread until a simulation finishes or a
277                                // new simulation is queued.
278                                if (System.currentTimeMillis() > abortTime) {
279                                        log.error(
280                                                        "Low memory has not been cleared after "
281                                                                        + WAIT_FOR_MEMORY / 1000 + " seconds. Aborting"
282                                        );
283                                        break;
284                                }
285                                this.waitForEvent(checkAgainInMs);
286                        }
287                        this.exporter.finaliseAll();
288                        while (!this.exporter.allWaiting()) {
289                                log.info("Waiting for output to complete...");
290                                Thread.sleep(1000);
291                        }
292                        log.info("Completed.");
293
294                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
295                        e.printStackTrace();
296                } finally {
297                        if (this.factory != null) { this.factory.halt(); }
298                        if (this.exporter != null) { this.exporter.close(); }
299                        if (executor != null) { executor.halt(); }
300                }
301        }
302
303        private void waitForEvent(long ms) throws InterruptedException {
304                synchronized (this.trigger) {
305                        this.trigger.wait(ms);
306                }
307        }
308
309}
310
